data.description: OOP methods for Internet Dictionary Project
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Over the weekend I got distracted long enough to rediscover
    theInternet Dictionary Project (IDP) and wrote a Perl OOP interface
    for searching the various English to Foobar files.

    At least one person I exchange email with thought it was
    interesting, so I figured I would shared it with the CPAN.

    see also:

    http://aaronland.info/perl/lingua/lexicon/idp/Lingua-Lexicon-IDP-1.0.tar.gz
    http://aaronland.info/perl/lingua/lexicon/idp/docs.html

    http://archive.develooper.com/modules@perl.org/msg17521.html
    http://archive.develooper.com/modules@perl.org/msg17497.html
